title: All Day All Night
lyrics:
Oh
Oh
Nuga malhae jul su isseulkka
I seontaegi mattago hogeun teullyeottageona
Neol mannan sungandeul da Highlight
Huhwehaji ana areumdaul ppuniya



Sesangeul dalli bogi shijakae

Yeah it’s all for you

Shigani bicheul naegi shijakae

Yeah it’s all for you

Neomu apeudeon uri nunmuldo

Gaseum beokchaoreudeon hwanhido

All for you, all for you, all for you



Tteugeoweojija teojil geotcheoreom

Deo saranghal subakke eopge

(Baby you’re my type of world)

Keuge sori jilleo

Baby you’re my world

Deo pieonal shinsegye neon mitge dwel kkeoya



All day all day all night

Barago weonhan geon

All day all day all night

Baby neoppuniya

Oh my god jeonyuri olla

All day all day all night

Seoro nogadeuneun geol



Ginagin peuribyucheoreom

Jiteun gonggam sok barabon jigeume

Jangmyeoneun dashi neoye eolgul

Nan barabol subakke meonghage

Byeoreul buditcheo Let’s spark it

Eoryeoul geotteureun eopji

Feel the vibe deo tteugeoun bukkocheul deonjilkke

Baby it’s all for you



Deo weonhaneun geol malhaejweo

Geumjidwen georagon eopseo

Micheoboneun geotto joa

Nareul seontaekaesseuni

Bame gipgo saeparan jeongjeokdo

Hannaje taeyang geu nunbushimdo

All for you, all for you, all for you



Tteugeoweojija teojil geotcheoreom

Deo saranghal subakke eopge

(Baby you’re my type of world)

Keuge sori jilleo

Baby you’re my world

Deo pieonal shinsegye neon mitge dwel kkeoya



All day all day all night

Barago weonhan geon

All day all day all night

Baby neoppuniya

Oh my god jeonyuri olla

All day all day all night

Seoro nogadeuneun geol



Geudaero dweo apeun sangcheodo anajweo Oh no

Geu jeonbuga da neowa na

Jageun nalgaetjise Control

Nae sesangeul bakkun neo



Tteugeoweojija teojil geotcheoreom

Deo saranghal subakke eopge

(I wanna give it to you)

Keuge sori jilleo

Baby you’re my world (Yeah)

Deo pieonal shinsegye neon mitge dwel kkeoya (Oh)



All day all day all night (All night)

Barago weonhan geon

All day all day all night

Baby neoppuniya (Oh)

Oh my god jeonyuri olla (olla)

All day all day all night

Seoro nogadeuneun geol



Yeah I like that hahaha

All night girl, my girl, your world
